entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 1200D Medium Weight Winter Horse Neck Cover Hood 150g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Hoods
Price: 39.99

RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket hood features a 1200D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut-resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry.

THE PERFECT BLANKET HOOD - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket hood for almost any horse and climate, due to its highly adjustable design, hefty 150g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.

COMFORTABLE FIT - this blanket hood has a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation of the hair coat or mane, and a cozy 150g of Polyfil to keep your horse warm in the worst weather.

QUICK ATTACH SNAPS - this hood attaches to your blanket via three adjustable heavy-duty swiveling snaps, which allows you to adjust the placement of your hood for the best fit possible, and put it on/off with ease.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Extreme Elements 1200D Heavy Weight Waterproof Winter Horse Turnout Blanket 300g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 119.99

Our Extreme Elements Series 1200D Arctic Plaid Ripstop Nylon Heavyweight Horse Turnout Blankets are available in two modern and attractive plaid options, Arctic Purple and Ice Blue, and are sure to make your horse stand out in the pasture! These heavyweight 300g Polyfil blankets are durable, with ripstop 1200D nylon shells, as well as extra warm to protect against the elements in even the worst weather. These blankets are our highest rated blankets and you definitely canât go wrong with choosing one for your horse!

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

THE PERFECT EVERYDAY BLANKET - this versatile blanket was designed to work for a wide variety of horses and be the perfect every-day blanket for chilly autumn, winter, and spring weather and for use in both dry and wet conditions.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 300g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 1200D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Sizing Information

This turnout blanket is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horseâs chest to the end of your horseâs rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

entry.title: Derby Originals Mesh Belly Band Reflective Trim Horse Fly Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Sheets
Price: 52.99

Derby Originalsâ premium mesh bellyband fly sheet was designed with your horseâs comfort and safety in mind. This fly sheet features a breathable mesh that helps keep your horse cool, as well as block harmful UV rays, and prevent biting insects from harming or irritating your horse. This fly sheet features new twists on the classic fly sheet design by adding back reflective strips to increase pasture visibility and safety and adding a full mesh belly band to keep insects away from your horseâs sensitive belly. The soft fleece wither relief also prevents your horseâs mane from being damaged. This blanket is fully adjustable and features adjustable chest closures, adjustable shoulder gussets, adjustable belly band straps, and adjustable crossed leg straps.

Â 

Features

    KEEPS PESTS AWAY - this fly sheet was designed to help protect your horseâs body, chest, and belly from biting insects and pests. Insects are unable to get through the mesh to bite at your horse, in turn preventing sores, irritation, and wounds from bug bites or reactions to them.

    COMFORTABLE FIT - our fly sheets have a soft fleece wither relief to prevent mane damage, soft trim covering the edges of the blanket, and are made with a mesh that wonât rub your horseâs fur or irritate their skin. The crossed leg straps are designed to prevent slippage or chafing.

    REFLECTIVE TRIM - the back corners of this fly sheet have strips of reflective material sewn onto them so that your horse will be visible from even great distances at night, making your horse more visible and safe at pasture, especially during times like hunting season!

    BREATHABLE DESIGN - this fly sheet is designed with a lightweight but strong mesh body that is breathable and helps keep your horse cool, while also keeping bugs away from them.

    ADJUSTABLE FIT - this fly sheet features adjustable shoulder gussets that allow your horse to move more freely, along with two adjustable chest straps and an adjustable belly band and leg straps in order to make sure your horse gets the best fit possible.

    Â 

    Directions

    This product should be placed on your horse and used to keep biting insects and other pests away, protect your horse from harmful UVÂ raysÂ and help keep your horse cool. This fly sheet can be used in the barn or pasture.

entry.title: Derby Originals Classic Woven Cotton Hunter Beige Plaid Horse Summer Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Sheets
Price: 39.99

Our Classic Lightweight Hunter Beige Plaid Horse Summer Sheet is a must have for every horse owner: whether you need a lightweight layer to help dry your horse after a bath or keep them clean before a show, are looking for a cover to keep flies away from your horse in the summer, or are looking for a cozy, soft underlayment to keep your horse warm and prevent blanket irritation during the winter, our fleece sheet is perfect! These cotton sheets are even perfect for other equines such as mules and donkeys!

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSEâS COMFORT IN MIND - this summer sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear long-term and is designed to keep your horse warm in cool weather without overheating.
  • HELPS KEEP YOUR HORSE CLEAN - this sheet is lightweight and excellent to use in any season to keep your horse clean before a show or event, or use to help dry your horse and keep them comfortable after a bath.
  • PROTECTS AGAINST PESTS - this sheet is great for use as a flu sheet as it helps to keep your horseâs body protected from biting pests such as mosquitoes, flies, and gnats that would otherwise cause sores and irritation.
  • CLASSICAL DESIGN WITH PREMIUM FEATURES - this summer sheet features classic designs with a shoulder gusset, front chest buckles, crossed belly surcingles, removable elastic leg straps, and a fleece wither protector.
  • GREAT AS A BLANKET UNDERLAYMENT - this sheet is excellent for use during cold weather as an extra layer beneath blankets to help keep your horse warm inside the barn, or in the pasture on chilly days.

Sizing Information:

This sheet is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horseâs chest, to the end of your horseâs rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

Blanket Care:

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

Product Information

Blanket Style: Summer Sheet

Waterproof: No

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Lightweight

Material: Cotton

Denier: n/a

Ripstop: No

Tail Cover: No

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfil: 0g

Inner Lining: Cotton

Belly Closure: Belly Surgincle

Leg Straps: Removable Elastic

Colors Available: Hunter Green/Beige Plaid

Sizes Available: 72â, 74â, 76â, 78â, 80â, 82â, and 84â

entry.title: Derby Originals 600D Ripstop Nylon Waterproof Heavy Weight Winter Horse Blanket Hood with 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Neck Covers
Price: 19.95

Our 600D Ripstop Nylon Waterproof Heavyweight Winter Horse Blanket Hood was designed to provide an extra layer of protection against the elements, even in the most severe weather, for your horseâs sensitive neck. This no-rub turnout hood will not rub or damage your horseâs mane and is great for preventing snow, rain, or mud from getting on the hair. This hood has 150 grams of polyfill evenly distributed throughout it to help warm your horse and prevent chills. This hood is a great option for horses that are competing or showing during the winter season who need their manes protected, are clipped or shaved, or just need a little extra warmth.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket hood is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a Teflon coating. These blankets are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the blanket is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket.


  • RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket hood features a 600D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry of a hood tear.
  • THE PERFECT BLANKET HOOD - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket hood for almost any horse and climate, due to its highly adjustable design, hefty 190g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.
  • COMFORTABLE FIT - this blanket hood has a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation on the hair coat or mane, and a cozy 195g of Polyfil to keep your horse warm in the worst weather.
  • QUICK ATTACH SNAPS - this hood attaches to your blanket via three adjustable heavy-duty swiveling snaps, which allows you to adjust the placement of your hood for the best fit possible, and put it on/off with ease.
  • ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURERâS WARRANTY - this blanket hood comes with a one year manufacturerâs warranty through Derby Originals, which protects against manufacturing and quality defects.

Sizing Information

This blanket hood is designed with the average horse in mind, and the sizing is based off that. A Small size will fit larger ponies, cobs, and smaller horses, a Medium fits most average horses or thick-necked cobs, a Large fits most larger sized horses, and an X-Large fits larger, thick-necked horses or warmbloods and some light drafts.

Â

Derby Originals Fleece Cooler for Horses All Season Sheet & Blanket Liner with Crossed Surcingles is an excellent and affordable option for the horse owner looking for a lightweight, breathable, moisture-wicking, and comfortable sheet that is ideal in all seasons and extremely versatile. These coolers/blanket liners are ideal for many applications such as: using after a bath or hard ride to absorb excess water/sweat and dry your horse off without the risk of overheating, using in cool or fluctuating weather to keep your horse warm without overheating, putting on your horse before a show to keep their coat clean, or using as an underlayer beneath another blanket to provide extra warmth during cold weather.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry.
